title: The Pin-Up Artist
description: Don't play with fire...Newly divorced and happily single Ginger Garrett thought her luck had changed when she won the chance to photograph a charity calendar for the children's hospital. Not only was this a golden opportunity for her career, she'd get to play with fire with the sexy firemen. That is until real fires started breaking out in her little sea side town. Court thought he was doing a good job keeping his identity hidden until Ginger's nutty mother stumbled into a dangerous crime ring. Now his investigation and his heart are both on the line. Can he save the case, the crazy mother and convince Ginger that love as hot as theirs is worth fighting for?
author: Elle Marlow
